archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Preliminary
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation:
Mandat, forutsetningene for å jobbe med Arkitektur. Hva skal vi gjøre over tid! Hva er driverne i vår organisasjon? Hva vil politikerne, hva er det push på? Hvordan plasseres vi i resten av det vi samhadler med?
Objectives: * Determine desired Architecture Capability * Establish the architecture capability
Approach: * Defining the Enterprise * Identifying drivers and organizational context * Defining requirements and architecture principles * Defining the framework to be used and its relationship to otheer frameworks * Evaluation the enterprise architecture maturity.
